description: I've been playing this game for years. There are hundreds of campaigns, scenarios, or you can write your own. This is basically chess come to life with a fairly decent AI opponant or you can play online against other people.
RNG is evil, but the game is fun!
summary: Very good for turn based strategy players

description: But except tutorial there are no campains at all
In this version only the tutorial campaign is preinstalled. Remember to press the Add-on button to install the campaigns which you prefer, i.e. "A tale of two brothers".
summary: Very good turn-based strategy fantasy game

description: Wonderfully intuitive and artfully designed, this game only keeps improving! The fantasy elements are base off of J.R.R. Tolkien's world of Lord of the Rings to a degree, and the multitudes of troops are well animated and backed with interesting (albeit made up) lore and tales. The strategy is not an afterthought; through simple troop abilities the battles can become very interesting indeed, and it is quite enjoyable. Wesnoth also has a very active community. This game has given many memories.

The game is a must-have if you're in turn based, fantasy strategy games.

This package only seems to include the core package, only the training campaign, no music and who knows what else is missing... So "apt install wesnoth" may be the better choice, unless you only want to have a quick look.

summary: One of the best turn-based games ever
